ygData.subject: Re: You are a Wizard Act as one
ygData.msgSnippet: dude, i couldn t have said that better myself. This is a man of inspiration people. ( i m drunk by the way so if i say something stupid just ignore it plz and
ygData.messageBody:
dude, i couldn't have said that better myself. This is a man of inspiration
people. ( i'm drunk by the way so if i say something stupid just ignore it
plz and i appologize)

>From: "Rick & Sherry" <ricksher@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_wizards] You are a Wizard Act as one
>Date: Fri, 14 May 1999 17:17:34 -0400
>
>From: "Rick & Sherry" <ricksher@...>
>
>Here is you reality of life. You are a WIZARD! You have chosen this life
>because you seek to be the knowledge keeper of this land. You should seek
>to gain the knowledge of where items are and how to get them. You are not
>a
>solo machine. You are meticulous, thinking. Not a tank that jumps into
>battle and gets his head bashed.
>
>Seek a tank to stay close to you. He/she is your armor. The tank is what
>keeps you back to from the blows. let him take the blows and with YOUR
>power he will not take the massive damage. Tell me what 12th level warrior
>is going to do 72 hps of damage at once or 30 hps to multiple targets.
>NONE
>will. Yes we have no armor but that is because you are not suppose to be
>in there hand to hand. That is not becoming of us to be hand to handing it
>with some stupid Creature. Let the tank get dirty.
>
>If you are a wizard act as one. You are the thinker of this world. You
>are
>the keeper of knowledge in this world.
>
>Fadil
>Sousek Ro
>
>
>
